The graphic bears the logo of One News: a Philippine media organization, and shows remarks that Senator Bong Go purportedly made on May 4, 2020.
The quote from Go: translated from Tagalog to English, states that ABS-CBN's closure is due to its anti-Duterte reports and that the President's feelings were hurt.
One News: the original source of the graphic, confirmed that it was doctored and spread false information. They provided a side-by-side comparison of the original and doctored graphics.
